name: key-stone
effect: Allows the player's Pokémon to Mega Evolve.
short_effect: Allows the player's Pokémon to Mega Evolve.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A stone filled with an unexplained power. It makes
Pokémon that battle with a Mega Stone
Mega Evolve.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
A stone filled with an unexplained power. It makes
Pokémon that battle with a Mega Stone
Mega Evolve.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
A stone filled with an unexplained power. It reacts to
Mega Stones and makes Pokémon Mega Evolve.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
A stone filled with an unexplained power. It makes
Pokémon that battle with a Mega Stone
Mega Evolve.
